scripts.transform: pnpm token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/tott/global.json global --resolveReferences=false && pnpm token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/tott/tott.json global,tott global --resolveReferences=false && pnpm token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/tott/tott-components.json global,tott,components global,tott && pnpm token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/webapp/global.json global --resolveReferences=false && pnpm token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/webapp/webapp.json global,webapp global --resolveReferences=false && pnpm token-transformer lib/tokens.json dist/sets/webapp/webapp-components.json global,webapp,components global,webapp
scripts.transpile: pnpm transform && node scripts/sd-build.js && pnpm rollup -c
